item.title: How-To: Deploy Datapio OpenCore
item.description: Prerequisites Ansible, >=2.9 Kubernetes, >=1.14 an Ingress controller such as NGinx a load balancer for your LoadBalancer services (especially the Ingress controller) kubectl, >=1.14 Helm, >=2.16 NB: Minikube and kind are supported but you will have to manually provide the Ingress controller requirements (the load balancer). Create your playbook $ mkdir playbook $ cd playbook $ cat > requirements.yml <<EOF --- - src: https://github.com/datapio/ansible-role-opencore.git version: master name: datapio-opencore EOF $ cat > site.
